embeds.title: **⊱ ────── { Webtoon Creators**
embeds.description:
If you’re a webtoon creator, congratulations, and we wish you the best on your journey! 

To get the creator role, post your webtoon in <#732618737441570835> and an online staff member will give you the role and a channel! 

In webtoon hangout, we actively support all webtoon creators. To do so, not only do we give a role and a channel, we promote creators weekly with Canvas of the Week!

fields.name: > Canvas of the Week
fields.value:
**Canvas of the Week** is where we pick a random creator in the server and we post their webtoon on our Instagram and move their channel higher. 
[<#765292554609623060>]

fields.name: > How do you sign up?
fields.value: To signup, DM <@370323093224292354>, and she will DM you back if you’re chosen for the week. You’ll be given a few days to give her your cover/sketch/art that will be posted on Instagram!
